abstract: In an exchange with Ben Bernanke of the Federal Reserve, Jamie Dimon, the chief executive of JPMorgan Chase, questioned whether regulation was too harsh. CNBC discusses whether this is the broad industry view.
snippet: In an exchange with Ben Bernanke of the Federal Reserve, Jamie Dimon, the chief executive of JPMorgan Chase, questioned whether regulation was too harsh. CNBC discusses whether this is the broad industry view.
lead_paragraph: In an exchange with Ben S. Bernanke of the Federal Reserve, Jamie Dimon, the chief executive of JPMorgan Chase, questioned whether regulation was too harsh. CNBC discusses whether this is the broad industry view.

headline.main: How Dimon Played on Wall Street
